author: Anna Wellisz
title: Why the Media Pounced on Poland and Hungary’s Coronavirus Measures
description:
Has either government taken any steps that go beyond what Western Europe has done?
The post Why the Media Pounced on Poland and Hungary’s Coronavirus Measures appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Has either government taken any steps that go beyond what Western Europe has done? As the deadliest pandemic since the Spanish Flu sweeps the globe, the media have been understandably focused on the novel coronavirus and the way to stop it. All the more surpr… [+9151 chars]
